#Question 2
```{r}
getwd()
DDT = read.csv("DDT.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")
head(DDT)
m=with(DDT, as.numeric(levels(factor(MILE))))
colm = c()
for (i in 1:length(DDT$MILE)) {
colm[i]=which(DDT$MILE[i]==m)
}
coplot(LENGTH~WEIGHT|RIVER*SPECIES,data=DDT,col=colm)
```
